mapper.select: SELECT SGG1.SGG_NM AS MAX_SGG, DM.MAX_VSTR, SGG2.SGG_NM AS MIN_SGG, DM.MIN_VSTR, DM.AVG_VSTR FROM DM_SGG_VSTR_MAX_MIN DM, SGG_CODE SGG1, SGG_CODE SGG2 WHERE SGG1.SGG_CD = DM.MAX_SGG AND SGG2.SGG_CD = DM.MIN_SGG
SELECT RTRIM(TRUNC(SUM(EXPN_TOTAL), -8), '0') AS EXPN_TOTAL FROM DM_TS_SGG_EXPN
SELECT KC.KEY_WORD, ROWNUM FROM DM_DS_SRCH_THR DM, DS_KEYW_CODE KC WHERE DM.KEYW_CD = KC.KEYW_CD
